alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:53PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ROOSEVELT AND SOUTHERN CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM MDT... At 952 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Melrose, or 18 miles northwest of Portales, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Melrose, Dora, Floyd, Saint Vrain, Cannon Air Force Base, Ranchvale, Oasis State Park and Portair. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 361 and 395. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
